rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Art Deco-inspired detailing and modern farmhouse aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open-plan living area featuring Art Deco motifs, comfortable seating, and natural light from West-facing windows. Integrated library corner with bookshelves and a reading nook.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering space for dining and social gatherings.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom equipped with essential fixtures and Art Deco finishes.

garage.description: A two-car garage integrated on the side of the building, adhering to local norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with Art Deco inspired furniture and farmhouse decor. Features ample storage and a balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom for additional guest space.

rooms.name: Study/Library
